item.title: End Middle Fork John Day River Road at OR-7
item.description: End Middle Fork John Day River Road at OR-7 in Grant County. Use OR-7 west for US-26 Jct; OR-7 east for Baker City.

item.title: US-26 East at OR-7 - Austin Junction
item.description: US-26 East at OR-7 north to Sumpter and Baker City.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 304 Offramp at OR-7
item.description: I-84 West - Exit 304 offramp at OR-7 in Baker City. Turn left on OR-7 west to Sumpter.

item.title: OR-7 West - Grant County
item.description: Entering Grant County on OR-7 west.

item.title: OR-7 West Approaching OR-245
item.description: OR-7 West approaching OR-245 in Baker County. Use OR-245 west for Unity.

item.title: US-30 West at OR-7 - Baker City
item.description: US-30 West/OR-7 east in Baker City. Turn right for US-30 East/OR-7 South to Ontario and John Day. Turn left for OR-7 west to Richland and Hells Canyon (via OR-86).

item.title: US-30 East Approaching OR-7
item.description: US-30 east approaching OR-7. Use left lane for Richland and Halfway. Both of these communities are along OR-86 between Baker City and Hells Canyon.

item.title: End OR-7 East Approaching I-84 West
item.description: End OR-7 East approaching I-84 West to Richland (via OR-86), Hells Canyon (via OR-86) and La Grande.

item.title: End OR-7 East at I-84 East
item.description: End OR-7 East at I-84 East. Turn right for I-84 east to Ontario; straight for I-84 west to La Grande and (Oregon Trail) Interpretive Center.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-7 East Split
item.description: US-30 West/OR-7 east in Baker City. Turn left for US-30 west to North Baker Business District, Haines, and Anthony Lakes. Continue straight for OR-7 east, to I-84, Richland, and La Grande.

item.title: US-30 West to I-84 - Baker City
item.description: US-30 West/(OR-7 East) along Main St. in Baker City. Continue along Main St. for I-84 (via OR-7).

item.title: OR-7 East at US-30
item.description: OR-7 east at US-30 in Baker City. Turn right on US-30 east for Ontario and Huntington. Continue straight on US-30 West/OR-7 East for La Grande and Portland.

item.title: OR-7 East Approaching US-30
item.description: OR-7 east approaching US-30 in Baker City.

item.title: OR-7 East - Entering Baker City
item.description: Entering Baker City on OR-7 East.

item.title: End OR-245 East at OR-7
item.description: End OR-245 east at OR-7. Turn right on OR-7 east for Baker City; turn left on OR-7 west for Sumpter and John Day.

item.title: OR-245 East Approaching OR-7
item.description: OR-245 east approaching OR-7. Use OR-7 west for Sumpter.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 304
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 304, OR-7 South/Geiser Grand Hotel/Baker City Center Historic District.

item.title: I-84 West - Baker City Route Map
item.description: Diagram of Baker City area routes on I-84 west, approaching eastern Baker City exit, #306.
